item.description:
Source School of Tantra Yoga
“Celebrating over 30 Years!”

Santa Cruz County, California
Tantra: The Art of Conscious Loving
Beginners Weekend Seminar presented by Charles Muir with Leah Alchin
February 27 - March 1, 2009 ~ Couples
March 13-15, 2009 ~ Singles[color]

Charles Muir will teach the world-renowned Tantra: The Art of Conscious Loving Beginners Weekend Seminar among towering Redwoods in the Californian Santa Cruz mountains. This is a rare opportunity to study directly with the Pioneer of the Tantra Movement in America. Discover the secrets of sexual intimacy, passion, and spiritual connection in this powerful, fun, and transformative weekend! To create a safe and relaxed environment, there is no nudity or explicit sexual contact in class. Home play is assigned. Here is just some of what you will learn to make you a conscious and masterful lover:


  • Breathing in lovemaking ~ key to ecstasy
  • The lost art of kissing ~ five styles of erotic and esoteric connecting
  • Six kinds of healing and erotic touch
  • The keys to increasing intimacy and spiritual union
  • Freeing the female orgasm ~ it’s easy!
  • 1,001 methods of exquisite pelvic movement
  • Sexual healing and awakening for men, the secret that can Quadruple the length and power of your orgasm
  • Advanced lovemaking techniques you will use forever
  • Female sacred spot massage ritual ~ step-by-step instructions to heal, awaken, and release unlimited energy
  • Internal muscular exercises for increased energy and pleasure
  • And so much more


Testimonials:

“This is a wonderful, powerful training without parallel in the field of transformation.”
– Lew Mylar, Clinical and Consulting Psychologist

“I was amazed at how easy it was to become aware of old patterns, then to open to new possibilities in lovemaking.”
– Byron Johnson, Engineer

“This Tantra workshop is the most significant opportunity available for people looking to bring together spirituality, sexuality & intimacy. It’s time for couples & singles of all ages to heal the much-neglected individual & collective wound, which separates ourselves from the beloved in each of us.”
– Daniel Stanberry, Chiropractor and Shanna Stanberry, Licensed Psychologist

NEW! FREE Monthly Community Preview Evening and Puja Ritual with Charles Muir! Join Charles Muir for a fun and informative lecture and powerful, inspirational, and opening Tantric Puja Ritual. These events will leave you wiser and uplifted, with all your chakras more open and bright!

February 21, 2009 and March 16, 2009
Pacific Cultural Center 7:30 pm – 10 pm
1307 Seabright Avenue Love Offering Donation
Santa Cruz, CA 95062 RSVP santacruz@sourcetantra.com

Tantra: The Art of Conscious Loving® Beginners Weekend Seminar
February 27-March 1, 2009 (Couples), March 13-15, 2009 (Singles)

Times: Friday 6:45 pm to 10:30 pm ~ Saturday 10 am to 7:30 pm ~ Sunday – 10 am to 8 pm

Location: Charles Muir & Leah Alchin's Home Temple, Boulder Creek, CA (directions upon registration)

Closest Airports: San Jose (45 minutes to 1-hour drive), San Francisco or Oakland (1-1/2 to 2-hour drive)

Cost: $450 per person. Meals and accommodations not included. Graduate rate $225!

Hotel Accommodations: For best selection reserve at least 30 days in advance.
Boulder Creek Country Club Boulder Creek 831.338.2111
Merrybrook Lodge Boulder Creek 831.338.6813
Quality Inn and Suites Lodge Ben Lomond 831.336.2292


REGISTRATION
Coordinator: Kerry Churchill To register: www.sourcetantra.com
Phone: 831.566.2113 Email: santacruz@sourcetantra.com
